title: Kiribati (1977) Genesis Portion
title_vernacular: Kiribati Te Buku ae Kamatang (1977, Genesis Portion)
description: Gilbertese or taetae ni Kiribati, also Kiribati (sometimes Kiribatese), is an Austronesian language spoken mainly in Kiribati. It belongs to the Micronesian branch of the Oceanic languages.
provider: The Bible Society in the South Pacific

language.name: Kirghiz
language.area: Widespread. Also in Afghanistan, China, Kazakhstan, Russian Federation (Asia), Tajikistan, Turkey (Asia), United States, Uzbekistan.
